019package com.plotsquared.bukkit.uuid;
020
021import com.destroystokyo.paper.profile.PlayerProfile;
022import com.plotsquared.core.uuid.UUIDMapping;
023import com.plotsquared.core.uuid.UUIDService;
024import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
025import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
026
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.UUID;
030
031/**
032 * UUID service that uses the Paper profile API
033 */
034public class PaperUUIDService implements UUIDService {
035
036    @Override
037    public @NonNull List<UUIDMapping> getNames(final @NonNull List<UUID> uuids) {
038        final List<UUIDMapping> mappings = new ArrayList<>(uuids.size());
039        for (final UUID uuid : uuids) {
040            final PlayerProfile playerProfile = Bukkit.createProfile(uuid);
041            if ((playerProfile.isComplete() || playerProfile.completeFromCache()) && playerProfile.getId() != null) {
042                mappings.add(new UUIDMapping(playerProfile.getId(), playerProfile.getName()));
043            }
044        }
045        return mappings;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public @NonNull List<UUIDMapping> getUUIDs(final @NonNull List<String> usernames) {
050        final List<UUIDMapping> mappings = new ArrayList<>(usernames.size());
051        for (final String username : usernames) {
052            final PlayerProfile playerProfile = Bukkit.createProfile(username);
053            if ((playerProfile.isComplete() || playerProfile.completeFromCache()) && playerProfile.getId() != null) {
054                mappings.add(new UUIDMapping(playerProfile.getId(), playerProfile.getName()));
055            }
056        }
057        return mappings;
058    }
059
060}
